data.text: @Shotokan67 @lindaallen437 @vaccinesSaveUsa @irishlaura777 @newsmax I do understand what you are trying to say, and you are correct - STANDING up against the biggest gang in America(the police force) is not gonna get you anywhere. Police will enforce illegal/unconstitutional laws or arrest you under another reason for their trouble.

@Shotokan67 @lindaallen437 @vaccinesSaveUsa @irishlaura777 @newsmax Exactly...you defined it yourself and did not even read what you wrote. MOST Mandates do not have legal validity or binding effect. You can not force a medical procedure it is considered assault. You can't prosecute someone for not wearing a mask but cops will arrive and trespass

@toomuch72 @lindaallen437 @vaccinesSaveUsa @irishlaura777 @newsmax Let me help you here. FORCE OF LAW means having legal validity or binding effect. 
Your feeling and opinions on the mandates are irrelevant unless the mandates are proven unlawful which is NOT the case.
@toomuch72 @lindaallen437 @vaccinesSaveUsa @irishlaura777 @newsmax Please check the definition of assault and false imprisonment. Seriously.

@toomuch72 @lindaallen437 @vaccinesSaveUsa @irishlaura777 @newsmax When you talk about laws, mandates, you are at the heart of what government is and most of your tweets/posturing is compatible with agorism. For example, what "REAL LAWMAKERS" are you referring to? Name them. 
Sorry but what I see is Right-wing extremism, sorry.

@Shotokan67 @lindaallen437 @vaccinesSaveUsa @irishlaura777 @newsmax There are no mandates for these...period. Requiring these via military/schools all ways had opt outs or a choice not to take them. Same with state LAWS, Not mandates, from past pandemics they could only assign a SMALL FINE(about 150 today) they still could not require the shot.

@Shotokan67 @lindaallen437 @vaccinesSaveUsa @irishlaura777 @newsmax Force of law means nothing if it is NOT LAWFUL. Hitler did his atrocities under the FORCE OF LAW. Leaning on the fact that a person can create laws to enforce their side of political paradigm shows when LAW is no longer a protective measure but instead a control tool.

@Shotokan67 @lindaallen437 @vaccinesSaveUsa @irishlaura777 @newsmax NO. LEARN GOV. I'm an agorist. I use centrist to make it less scary. Ancaps or those who follow agorism think government are the problem. So I don't prescribe to any side, but I'm also seem to understand how government works more than anyone caught in the left right paradigm.
@toomuch72 @lindaallen437 @vaccinesSaveUsa @irishlaura777 @newsmax You mean the right-wing radical extremist lawmakers you support under the cover of your "centrist" label?
@toomuch72 @lindaallen437 @vaccinesSaveUsa @irishlaura777 @newsmax ...So they have force of law. Read your own tweet. You are confirming EXACTLY what I said.
